com.sap.integration.anywhere

Class AnwServiceCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.anywhere.AnwServiceCall

  • public class AnwServiceCall
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which contains helper methods used for making HTTP calls to SAP Anywhere.

      • responseRequiresAccessTokenRefresh

        private static boolean responseRequiresAccessTokenRefresh(AnwSimpleResponse response)
        Method, which identifies, whether it is necessary to refresh access token or not. Blank value of access token might cause returning of HTTP STATUS 500 - Internal Server Error.
        Parameters:
        response - - response with response data used for verification of access token validity
        Returns:
        true - it is necessary to refresh access token
        false - it not necessary to refresh access token

      • loadAndUpdateAccessToken

        private static java.lang.String loadAndUpdateAccessToken(java.lang.String oldUrl)
        Method, which loads new access token and attach it to the entered URL.
        Parameters:
        oldUrl - - old url with expired access token
        Returns:
        new URL with new valid access token

      • isBlankAccessToken

        private static boolean isBlankAccessToken(java.lang.String url)
        Method, which identifies, whether access token is missing or not.
        Parameters:
        url - - URL used for identification whether access token is missing or not
        Returns:
        true - access token is missing
        false - access token is not missing
